Class FilesCore

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Core methods for content handling

      static FileDetails createFile(java.io.InputStream file) 
      static java.lang.String generateTemporaryUrl(java.lang.String guid)
      Note: this does NOT validate the GUID, it is assumed to exist (using the generated url to access non-existent resource will result in an error)

        public static FileDetails createFile(java.io.InputStream file)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        file -
        Returns:
        details for the created file or null on failure
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on bad input data

      • updateFile

        public static boolean updateFile(FileDetails details)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This can be used to change the ownership (backend id) of the file, but not to change the url. If url is given, it is simply ignored.
        Parameters:
        details -
        Returns:
        true on success
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on invalid details

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getFileDetailsForToken

        public static FileDetails getFileDetailsForToken(java.lang.String token)
        Parameters:
        token -
        Returns:
        details for the token or null if token is not valid

      • generateTemporaryUrl

        public static java.lang.String generateTemporaryUrl(java.lang.String guid)
        Note: this does NOT validate the GUID, it is assumed to exist (using the generated url to access non-existent resource will result in an error)
        Parameters:
        guid -
        Returns:
        currently valid temporary url for the given guid/user pair
